name: Brothers (farvind)
description:
The game is about the two segments of fire ,Orange flame and blue flame opposite to their behaviour. 

Control: Up Arrow, Down Arrow, Right Arrow, Left Arrow

This game is developed for Global Game Jam Nepal 2022. 

Team:

Subit Dhakal-Developer and Designer

Manish Thapa-Developer

Farvind Acharya-Character Designer
